segments.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci sāragandhā, lohitacandanaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: “Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāya.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
And what are the qualities that lead to awakening?

segments.pli: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci sāragandhā, lohitacandanaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāyā”ti.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.”

sections.title: “Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is…

suttaplex.blurb: Just as red sandalwood is the best of fragrances, wisdom is the chief of qualities that lead to awakening.
